item.title: Virtualbox with static and dynamic IP
item.description: While installing docker on my windows 10 machine I found that Docker for Windows requires 64-bit Windows 10 Pro with Hyper-V available, what? omg, I was expecting something simple… but NISBEIP, let’s move on. Tried to use the Docker Toolbox that didn’t work as smooth as I expected. After some hours banging my head against the wall I decided to create a Linux Virtual Machine using Virtualbox and use docker from there.
